sn35.145:4.2: The cause and condition that gives rise to sights is also not-self.
sn35.145:4.3: Since sights are produced by what is not-self, how could they be self?
sn35.145:4.9: The cause and condition that gives rise to phenomena is also not-self.
sn35.145:4.10: Since phenomena are produced by what is not-self, how could they be self?
sn35.145:4.19: They understand: ‘Rebirth is ended, the spiritual life has been lived, what had to be done has been done, there is no return to any state of existence.’”
